This is almost too long but I DO have a short torso, and the straps dont fit to my shoulders as snugly without pulling too down to expose more the cleavage as I'd like for public use. Will be GREAT for home use, but I think I will order a small for classes and public spaces. Also, the white is very opaque. Not just a little. A small in white would be worse, so I'll order probably order a black. Will look more flattering when I tone up, but I didn't buy this to look sexy so.it does the job.  I'm more surprised this fit so large on me after all the reviews of it fitting small. Did not expect that.

评论概述: Love this tank and it’s gots certified organic cotton
类型: Size: X-LargeColor: White With Black Moons
评论详情: I bought 2 of these and plan to buy more. They are soft and stretchy. I also confirmed with the seller that these are made of GOTS certified cotton and fiber reactive dyes that are GOTS certified.  I have found a number of places that use GOTS certified organic cotton but use only low impact dyes which are better than regular dyes but they still have heavy metals, formaldehydes and many other chemicals. GOTS certified fiber reactive dyes are what you want. GOTS prohibits these chemicals.  I am thankful to find these and the seller is very friendly and accommodating. I have chemical allergies and thankful to find this clothing line.

类型: Size: LargeColor: White With Black Moons
评论详情: The shirt is beautiful in design and quality. Runs very small though. Would go up about two sizes.

Love these tanks. Arrived just as described. The best part is that they are made of organic cotton, however sustainability is very important to me. I loved the brown paper bag they were wrapped in. But they were also wrapped in plastic! Please get rid of the plastic wrapper. Otherwise I would have given a 5 star. No more plastic!! Please

评论概述: Words on my boob, but I am impressed with their customer service.
类型: Size: SmallColor: Black I Love Yoga
评论详情: Original review: I was horrified to find that the company decided to take what would have otherwise been a cute top that actually had some length to it and use it to label my left boob. They seriously need to consider repositioning their words. I sent it back, because it looked stupid and made me feel self conscious. I'm small chested, so I don't' know if it would fit everybody this way or not, but I didn't like it. I would never pin a corsage across my nipple! I would pin it up a bit higher. Name tags? Same thing. I'm just not comfortable with the placement of the words. Just make a quality shirt and leave my breasts alone.  Updated review: Wow! I don't know what to think. This company evidently reads the reviews and cares what customers think. I did not write to the company, because I simply returned the item through Amazon, but... in response to my review, the company e-mailed me (through Amazon) the following:  "We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience regarding your order and would like to offer you a full refund for your purchase. If you would like a full refund: please reply 'Full refund'. We hope that you give us another chance. Thank you very much. Best regards, TREELANCE Please note – sellers are not allowed to ask for a customer’s personal information including email or phone number: and you are not expected to change your review due to this outreach or any potential resolution."  I won't, of course, ask for a refund, since Amazon already did that for me, but as it's becoming increasingly more difficult for customers to receive respect, I felt obligated to let everybody know that this company went out of their way to contact me. I am raising my 1 star review to 3. I still wouldn't want words across my breast, but customer service means a lot to me. I may not have liked this particular shirt, but I will most definitely be checking out their other products, because I'd love to do business with a company that wants happy customers. I would suspect that a company that reads reviews might also be using that feedback to improve or create products that customers want or need. I felt like I'd been heard, even though I hadn't contacted them. :-) So, 1 star for this particular product and 5 stars for customer service.
I bought this lovely shirt for my mom as a gift for doing yoga.  It is so nice that I am going to buy myself one too!

评论概述: Just wish it came in other colors!
类型: Size: MediumColor: Black With White Moons
评论详情: I am super happy to find an organic cotton tank at a very reasonable price. The fabric is nice, it fits well, and because it's organic cotton, it's breathable! I only wish it came in more colors. I used to wear black ALL the time, especially in outdoor gear and gym clothes, but now I prefer charcoal gray or other dark heather-ed colors. A lot of that is just because pure black often doesn't age well. It shows dirt, lint and pilling, so especially for wearing to the gym, etc., I'd rather have something else. Also, it's hot in the sun! I don't like slogans or sayings on my clothes either, but I do love the moons. Overall, I'm happy to have found an organic cotton tank at this price.

评论概述: Stretchy and Tight with a Nice Long Torso
评论详情: I've been searching for the ultimate tank top and this one hit a lot of my non-negotiable aspects.  It's nearly all cotton, has a bit of stretch, and has a longer torso.  As a taller woman of 5'10",  need the extra length and this was perfect in that area.  It may be a bit too stretchy, but I can live with it.  It is a little tight, so I'm glad I got the large.  A lot of my tanks are medium, but I've gained a little weight during the pandemic, so I went for the large.  It's still a bit tight, so when I washed it, I did not put it in the dryer, but hung it to dry instead.  It was a bit pricey, so I'm still looking around.  But for the time being, this will do.  4 stars.

Lovely cotton, attractive solid black front and perfectly not too low cut-- the fit of the top is exactly what I would have hoped for, and more.  I'm a size 12-14, and ordered the 3xxx (!!!) which fit perfectly, except, the patterns of moon phases started halfway down my back, and so many simply disappeared down my bottom past the point of visibility-- and some got hidden in a fold of fat or two-- so the moon phase pattern looked kind of awful on me, with a few hidden phases.  Which was too bad, because the fabric and fit were otherwise divine.  So, sadly, I sent it back.  Still, it's a great top; I hope it works out better for you in your size.

I buy these as a wardrobe staple in plain black. The fit is flattering on me as they are form fitting and the fabric is good quality and thick enough so that it has some support in the chest and isn’t see-through if worn with no bra under another shirt.  I wear them to sleep in and under as a base layer under other tops. One of the best quality tank tops I’ve found.

评论概述: Great for yoga poses, awareness  & embodyment of (message)
评论详情: I was wearing the “compassion” tank, so I was doing heart opening poses. Later, I went walking in my neighborhood and arrived at a Starbucks only to find the barista working on her cellphone. I chose to smile and say “excuse me.” After I got my drink, I noticed quite a few kindness acts involving elderly men and women—a car driver waiting patiently for a man with a walker at the crosswalk, for example. I am not usually aware of this sort of things, but with the tank I feel I am compassionate and I notice compassionate people. I highly recommend, and the fabric feels wonderful, not to mention the very basic.

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Black With White Moons
评论详情: I was looking for organic cotton tanks and let me tell you was not easy than I saw this cute tank top with back moon phase and decided to try . Like other reviewers say it is thick enough but not heavy I love the fact that is not a  short tank I love long tanks and this fits me just perfect so much that I ordered one the same. Unfortunately I am not a fan of the other designs and never wrote any garment with any writing on it so I am waiting for more simple minimal design but now I am content with the moon phase design.

I was so excited to get this top. It looked real cool in the pictures. Unfortunately the top is real stiff material, not soft at all and is super long. I loved the design on the back so I kept the top for that reason. I ended up cutting it shorter so it could look half way decent. I would advice to go 2 sizes larger but then it would be super long and not too tight. Either way I cant win with this top

The quality of the tank top seems great. The thick and stretchy material appears that it will last a while.  My reason for taking off 2 stars is the placement of the word “compassion.” In the pictures it looks like it sits on top of the breast area. Cool.  Mine however, hides just underneath, like an underboob. And I’m not even that big anymore ( thanks to all this fitness). The word is almost lost when wearing a regular bra and barely noticeable when wearing a sports bra. Pretty disappointed as I really liked the design and simplicity of it! Will be returning :(

类型: Size: MediumColor: White With Black Moons
评论详情: I enjoy this shirt for Kundalini yoga class. It's cotton, and it has a cool, yet understated design on the back. I am 5'3", 120 lbs and ordered a medium. I should have ordered a small, but the medium is still working out for me. I just offer that as a tip for others who may be my size.  No one would think the shirt is too big, but it's my preference to have had a smaller shirt. Therefore, I think it's true to size, actually. I just ordered medium, when I should have ordered small.

Got 4 tanks of different designs and must say they fit perfectly and bring me GREAT comfort! I’m petite (5’3, cup A) and size Small fits 100%. I can also wear size Medium comfortably. The material is durable but also soft. I practice yoga and do high intensity workouts regularly and I can move easily with these tanks on. Also, it’s nice to know that the apparels are made in environmentally ethical fashion.

评论详情: It’s true these tanks run very small. I suggest you order a size larger than usual. What earned this tank a 5 star rating was the customer support from Karina, the shop owner. The shirt is supposed to fit snug. The graphic is adorable.
I am 5’1” and around 123 lbs. I bought the XS and it fits perfectly. Feels great. Doesn’t slide in poses.
I love that it's organic cotton, the fit is flattering and the great message on the front! I will buy more styles from this company!

I usually wear a Women's Size 14 shirt - sometimes Large, sometimes XL, depending on the style.  I ordered an XL so it would be loose and comfortable for yoga.  I assumed it was a Womens XL as the model is female.  When it arrived, the packaging said "Mens XL."  When I tried it on, it was skin tight.  Sizing must run at least 2 sizes small.

I love these tanks.  I tried to find the perfect tank top for my Crossfit workouts - one that wouldn't be too tight but that would not ride up or fall around my my head when I am in a handstand.  The ones with the moons on the back are a little imperfect - the moons don't line up perfectly with the center of the tank, so they don't line up exactly on my spine.  It doesn't bother me, but it is notable.  They are best in black.
